=== What He's doing ===
He is experienced developer for desktop aplications and web applications. He does everything from UI Development to hard coder work. (Not that UI Development isn't hard work ;-) ) 
He's a AskUbuntu user and also OpenSuSE Forum user. 
Currently he's developing my own OS based on OpenSuSE and also his own game for (yes I know) Windows and Linux(soon). It was released in Decembre of 2010.

=== What He has done ===

He is using Ubuntu since the version 8.04 because he really likes it and gave him more opportunities than Windows.
Becausse of his Windows History he made many applications for Windows like a browser or many games.

<nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/users/24914/|{{http://askubuntu.com/users/flair/24914.png?theme=dark}}]]</nowiki>

He's always reachable via Twitter.

He has <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~sebigrebe/+codesofconduct|signed]]</nowiki> and read the Ubuntu Code of Conduct.

=== What He plans to do ===

His plan is to finish his OS and make it public. He also wants to programm a big data management programm.
